"use strict";
Object.defineProperty(exports, "__esModule", { value: true });
exports.validatePhone = void 0;
function validatePhone(phone) {
    var clearPhone = phone.replace(/\D/g, '');
    if (!(clearPhone.length >= 10 && clearPhone.length <= 11))
        return false;
    if (clearPhone.length === 11 && +clearPhone.substring(2, 3) !== 9)
        return false;
    for (var n = 0; n < 10; n++) {
        if (clearPhone === new Array(11).join(String(n)) ||
            clearPhone === new Array(12).join(String(n))) {
            return false;
        }
    }
    var codesDDD = [
        11,
        12,
        13,
        14,
        15,
        16,
        17,
        18,
        19,
        21,
        22,
        24,
        27,
        28,
        31,
        32,
        33,
        34,
        35,
        37,
        38,
        41,
        42,
        43,
        44,
        45,
        46,
        47,
        48,
        49,
        51,
        53,
        54,
        55,
        61,
        62,
        64,
        63,
        65,
        66,
        67,
        68,
        69,
        71,
        73,
        74,
        75,
        77,
        79,
        81,
        82,
        83,
        84,
        85,
        86,
        87,
        88,
        89,
        91,
        92,
        93,
        94,
        95,
        96,
        97,
        98,
        99,
    ];
    if (codesDDD.indexOf(+clearPhone.substring(0, 2)) === -1)
        return false;
    if (clearPhone.length === 10 &&
        [2, 3, 4, 5, 7].indexOf(+clearPhone.substring(2, 3)) === -1) {
        return false;
    }
    return true;
}
exports.validatePhone = validatePhone;
